about_the_game:
REPLANTED follows a seemingly normal farmer, and his battle against his psyche as he tries to avoid being caught for the murder of his wife.

All screenshots are of alpha builds, and are subject to change. REPLANTED is inspired by the "Evil Farming Game" myth.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains realistic depictions of domestic violence, and murder. References to usage and the ability to take/overdose on drugs. Crude language. Realistic corpses. And extreme horror elements.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.10 or better. Not Supported: 11.0 or later
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Dual-Core Intel Core i5-4278U
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris 1536mb
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: one that works.
  • Additional Notes: Only works on Macs capable of running 32bit applications. Contact support for issues regarding controllers. This is the setup used to run the game on MacOS.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS 10.10 or better. Not Supported: 11.0 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (9th Gen or above)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Intel
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This is most preferable, almost any mac using M1 or above should be fine, only works on Macs capable of running 32bit applications

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / Ryzen 3 (any should work)
  • Memory: 5 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: one that works.
  • Additional Notes: these specs are for 60fps at 1080p. Running the game anywhere below 60fps will break the game. Contact support for issues regarding controllers.
